description.@en: Telescoping muzzles, switchblade-style two-handed swords, cog- driven crossbows and folding axes are only the tip of the iceberg of what can be accomplished by modifying implements of war.

effect.@en: Provided you have the appropriate tools, any two-handed weapon can be modified into a compact one-handed version (which only you can wield). Despite being one-handed, it retains its original function, but now has an Encumbrance of 1.
